article.title: Veterans, Active Duty Eat Free Wednesday
article.author: Rita Boland
article.abstract: In honor of Veterans Day, Applebee's invites veterans and active-duty military members to eat free at its restaurant locations on Wednesday, November 11.
article.text: In honor of Veterans Day, Applebee's invites veterans and active-duty military members to eat free at its restaurant locations on Wednesday, November 11. A list of acceptable proofs of identification and the menu items available with the offer are posted on the company's Web site. The programs listed on these pages are not affiliated with our publication or association. We highlight these independent efforts as a service to our military and our readers. For more information about these programs, please contact the organizations directly.
